text: Ngakube lowo osebufakazini obucacile (iQur’an) evela eNkosini yakhe futhi eyifunda ufakazi ovela kuyena futhi nangaphambilini kwayo kwakunencwadi kaMose engumholi nomusa labo bakholelwa kuyona futhi noma ngabe ubani ongakholelwa kuyona (iQur’an lowo) ovela emaqenjini ngakho-ke umlilo kuyoba indawo yakhe yesethembiso, ningabi nokungabaza ngayo ngempela yona iyiqiniso elivela eNkosini yakho kepha iningi labantu alikholwa
